article_title: Mitch McConnell outlines future opposition to 'Obamacare' if GOP wins Senate majority
article_text: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell said Friday that if Republicans take control of the Senate after this year's elections, he would move to repeal President Barack Obama's health care law regardless of a likely veto threat.
